content:
Can you provide a table of the top 5 most popular types of dogs based on AKC registration statistics from 2020?
| Rank | Breed         | Number of Registrations |
|------|---------------|------------------------|
| 1    | Labrador      | 89,256                 |
| 2    | French Bulldog| 38,443                 |
| 3    | German Shepherd| 36,447                |
| 4    | Golden Retriever| 32,065                |
| 5    | Bulldog         | 31,008                |

Certainly! Here's a table of the top 5 most popular dog breeds based on AKC registration statistics from 2020:

| Rank | Breed            | Number of Registrations |
|------|------------------|-------------------------|
| 1    | Labrador Retriever | 89,256                  |
| 2    | French Bulldog   | 38,443                  |
| 3    | German Shepherd  | 36,447                  |
| 4    | Golden Retriever | 32,065                  |
| 5    | Bulldog          | 31,008                  |

These numbers reflect the popularity of these breeds among dog owners in the United States according to the American Kennel Club.
